definition: Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)

sentences.english: BLCU has bought insurance of accidents and hospitalization for scholarship students.
sentences.chinese: 学校为奖学金生办理意外伤害和住院医疗保险。

sentences.english: Medicare is the name of Canada’s "single-payer" health care system.
sentences.chinese: 医疗保险是指加拿大的“统一支付方”医疗保健系统。

sentences.english: Medicare expenses are now expected to surpass Social Security's in 2028.
sentences.chinese: 医疗保险支出预计将在2028年超过社会保险。

sentences.english: Are dental implants covered by insurance?
sentences.chinese: 种植牙属于医疗保险范围吗？

sentences.english: Plus students still need money for books, transportation, medical insurance.
sentences.chinese: 学生需另付书费，交通费，医疗保险等。

sentences.english: Do the au pairs have medical insurance while in the United States?
sentences.chinese: 美国安亲褓姆学员在美国是否有医疗保险？

sentences.english: She hopes health care reform will allow her to buy reasonably priced health insurance.
sentences.chinese: 她希望医改能让她买到价格公道的医疗保险。

sentences.english: I balanced the benefits against the costs of medical insurance.
sentences.chinese: 我权衡了医疗保险的好处和它的花费。

sentences.english: Many families and small business owners will have health insurance for the very first time in their lives.
sentences.chinese: 许多家庭和小企业主将会极早的获得医疗保险。

sentences.english: Medicare I think is one of the cornerstones of our social safety net.
sentences.chinese: 我认为医疗保险是社会保障网的一块基石。

sentences.english: Fourth, the desalination and cancels basic medical insurance individual account finally.
sentences.chinese: 四是淡化并最终取消基本医疗保险个人帐户。

sentences.english: How Much Savings Can We Wring from Medicare?
sentences.chinese: 我们可以从医疗保险中省下多少？

sentences.english: This paper mainly study medical insurance system for urban workers.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要研究的对象为城镇职工医疗保险制度。

sentences.english: This is the promise we made when Medicare was born.
sentences.chinese: 这是医疗保险诞生之初我们许下的诺言。

sentences.english: Democratic senators favour a tax on high-value health insurance policies to raise revenue.
sentences.chinese: 民主党参议员支持对对高价值的医疗保险条款征税。

sentences.english: Washington will subsidise many of those on the new state exchanges.
sentences.chinese: 华盛顿将会资助许多新建的州医疗保险交易所。

definition: medical insurance/abbr. for 醫療保險|医疗保险[yi1 liao2 bao3 xian3]
social insurance/abbr. for 社會保險|社会保险
